Potable Water Meter Installation, Repair and Reading

Requirement text: A public service provided to the care giver of an elderly and frail adult offering a period of respite from care giving.

Name: Supportive Housing

Requirement text: A public service provided to homeless persons offering temporary shelter and supports.

Name: Homeless Shelter

Name: Homeless Outreach & Referral

Requirement text: A public service provided to homeless persons offering employment assistance and financial support.

Name: Homelessness Prevention

Name: Homeless Shelter Subsidy

Requirement text: A public service provided to transitional housing residents offering housing that is intended to offer a supportive living environment and tools and opportunities for social and skills development. It is an intermediate step between emergency shelters and supportive housing, with limits on the length of stay.
Name: Transitional Housing

Requirement text: A public service provided to transitional housing residents offering housing that is intended to offer a supportive living environment and tools and opportunities for social and skills development.
Name: Domiciliary Hostel Accommodation

Requirement text: A public service provided to housing owners / operators offering financial assistance to convert or intensify housing to more affordable options.

Name: Affordable Housing Construction and Maintenance

Shelter Conversion to Transitional Housing Subsidy

Requirement text: A public service provided to social housing residents and social housing operators offering non-profit or co-operative housing communities where some or all the rents are subsidized.
Name: Social Housing

Name: Social Housing Accommodation
Rent Geared to Income Housing Subsidy

Requirement text: A public service provided to social housing owners offering subsidies for rent for assisted housing leaseholders and occupants to meet their housing needs.
Name: Social Housing Subsidy

Requirement text: A public service provided to health hazard violators (e.g. firms emitting hazardous material into the air, water or land) and potential candidate victims of health hazards offering monitoring of air, water and land quality to ensure that it complies with provincial standards, and enforcing compliance with emission standards for violators.

Requirement text: A public service provided to the elderly and frail adults offering accommodation and supports.

Requirement text: A public service provided to children and their parents or guardians offering early learning opportunities to meet families’ child care needs through fee subsidies to eligible families.

Requirement text: A public service provided to unemployed / underemployed offering financial and employment supports.
Name: Social Support

Requirement text: A public service provided to unemployed / underemployed offering financial assistance in support of subsequent employment.
Name: Financial Assistance

Requirement text: A public service provided to Ontario Works Employment Support Recipients offering employment assistance in support of seeking and securing employment opportunities.
Name: Employment Assistance

Requirement text: This service provides for the intake, eligibility determination, case plan preparation, case plan implementation and monitoring.
Name: Social Support Case Management

Requirement text:
This service provides additional information about the local labour market and about resources and services in the community to applicants or participants to assist them in meeting eligibility requirements or to become involved in employment measures.  This service also includes the following types of referrals to other program and service providers:
- Referrals to program partners offering LEAP Parenting Training, Basic Education, etc.
- Referrals to agencies providing programs and services external to Ontario Works.
Name: Social Support Information and Referrals

Requirement text: A public service provided to crisis and outreach victims offering crisis and outreach interventions.

Requirement text: A public service provided to roadway users and adjacent property owners offering lighting of streets and roadways at night and other periods of darkness.  This service also includes the lighting of other public areas.
Name: Street Lighting

Name: Installation and Replacement of Street Lighting

Requirement text: A service delivery process group identified for the purpose of defining processes.
Name: Street Lighting Operations

Requirement text: A service delivery process group identified for the purpose of defining processes.
Name: Street Lighting Maintenance

Requirement text: An internal service provided to street lighting service providers offering management and optimization of street lights and appurtances over their useful life.
Name: Street Lighting Asset Lifecycle Management

Requirement text: A public service provided to traffic violators offering compliance with traffic code, and safer roadways for roadway users.
Name: Traffic Enforcement

Requirement text: A public service provided to incident victims and their families, property owners, and insurance companies offering mitigation of a life / property threatening incident.
Name: Fire Rescue

Requirement text: A public service provided to animal owners and property owners affected by roaming animals offering safe capture and detention of stray animals.

Requirement text: A public service provided to victims of incidents and perpetrators offering reduced loss of lives, reduced loss of property, reduced injury and improved security due to incidents.

Requirement text: A public service provided to victims of incidents and perpetrators offering intervention in incidents to reduce the loss of life or property due to the incident.

Requirement text: A public service provided to victims and their families, and youth at risk offering referral to support service providers.

Requirement text: A public service provided to potential employees and their prospective employers offering assurance of no criminal record of the employee.
Name: Security Clearance / Criminal Record Checking

Name: Security Clearance Checking

Requirement text: A public service provided to employers offering assurance that a prospective employee has no criminal record.
Name: Criminal Record Checking

Requirement text: A public service provided to students interested in crime prevention by offering training and awareness sessions.
Name: Crime Prevention Education

Requirement text: A public service provided to utility and construction contractors / operators offering advice on the location of underground infrastructure (e.g. gas lines, water lines, buried cable, etc.) thereby allowing the contractor who is digging around the site of such buried infrastructure not to damage the infrastructure.
Name: Utility Locating

Requirement text: A public service provided to roadway users offering convenient, safe access to public highways (roads) for the transport of people, goods and services.
Name: Road Access and Maintenance

Requirement text: An internal service provided to road service providers offering support in the design and construction of roads.
Name: Roadway Design and Construction

Requirement text: An internal service provided to road service providers offering maintenance of roads, roadways and appurtenances.
Name: Road Maintenance

Requirement text: A public service provided to roadway users offering safe passage along roadways during winter conditions.
Name: Winter Control (Road Snow and Ice Control)

Requirement text: An internal service provided to road service providers offering management and optimization of road infrastructure assets over their useful life.
Name: Road Asset Lifecycle Management

Requirement text: A public service provided to parking patrons offering a period of parking typically provided in a parking space accessible on the street or off the street in a parking lot or parking facility.
Name: Parking

Requirement text: A public service provided to parking patrons offering a period of parking typically provided in a parking space accessible on the street or off the street in a parking lot or parking facility.
Name: On-Street Parking

Requirement text: A public service provided to parking patron (vehicle operators) offering limited time parking privileges to conveniently access business establishments.
Name: Off-Street Parking

Requirement text: A public service provided to parking by-law violators and roadway users offering increased compliance with the Parking By-law.
Name: Parking By-Law Enforcement

Requirement text: A public service provided to parking patron offering a period of vehicular parking in residential or commercial areas.
Name: Parking Permission

Requirement text: A public service provided to road users offered controlled access to the roadway by vehicles, pedestrians and bicycles.
Name: Traffic Flow Control

Requirement text: A public service provided to school aged children and their parents offering safe crossing of busy roadways adjacent to schools.
Name: School Crossing Guard

Requirement text: A public service provided to persons wishing to occupy a portion of a public right-of-way, typically for retail use (e.g. outdoor patio), with permission to do so.
Name: Right-of-Way Occupancy Permission

Requirement text: A public service provided to pedestrians offering access to sidewalks, and involves provision of safe, functional sidewalks, including placement and maintenance of access curb ramps.
Name: Sidewalk and Pathway Access and Maintenance

Requirement text: A public service provided to pedestrians offering access to a new sidewalk.  Note, a sidewalk is typically constructed as part of a development proposal but the commissioning is acknowledging that the sidewalk constructed is to standard.
Name: Sidewalk Commissioning

Requirement text: A public service provided to transit riders / passengers offering a scheduled transit and Para transit trips.
Name: Transit

Requirement text: A public service provided to transit riders / passengers offering a scheduled transit trip.
Name: Scheduled Transit

Requirement text: A public service provided to contractors offering access to transit vehicles for regular transport of people.
Name: Contracted Transit

Requirement text: A public service provided to special event hosts offering access to transit vehicles for the transport of people.
Name: Special Event Transit

Requirement text: An internal service provided to transit service providers offering management and optimization of transit assets  over their useful life.
Name: Scheduled Transit Infrastructure Lifecycle Management

Requirement text: A public service provided to persons with mobility disabilities offering on demand transit trips to and from medical, shopping and recreational facilities thereby assisting these individuals in leading active, productive lifestyles.
Name: Para-Transit

Requirement text: A public service provided to airport users offering access to an airport facility.
Name: Airport

Requirement text: A public service provided to businesses offering a lease to access a portion of the airport facility to conduct their business.

Requirement text: A public service provided to airport users offering safety of passengers, employees and visitors as well as security of private and public property while using an airport.

Name: Airport Asset Lifecycle Management

Requirement text: A public service provided to ferry passengers offering a ferry trip
Name: Ferry

Requirement text: A public service provided to the community offering the development of partnerships to further the interests of the community.

Requirement text: A public service provided to park / open space users offering access to parks and open space for recreation and leisure pursuits.

Park & Open Space Asset Lifecycle Management

Requirement text: A public service provided to energy consumers offering financial assistance, energy audits, education and new energy saving products to conserve energy.
Name: Energy Conservation

Name: Electricity Generation

Requirement text: A public service provided to library users offering access to a library facility and its collection of material for personal use.
Name: Library

Requirement text: A public service provided to library facility users offering access to the library for various purposes, including meetings, seminars, etc.
Name: Library Facility Access

Requirement text: An internal service that guides the Corporation in the strategic direction for growth and program/service delivery.
Name: Corporate Leadership

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering a plan that sets out the vision, mission and core values of the municipality in the short- and long-term.
Name: Strategic Planning

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering resolution of issues that may arise from time to time.
Name: Issue Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering the design and/or restructuring of the organization to meet changing needs.
Name: Organizational Design

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering support to affiliated agencies, boards and commissions of the municipality.
Name: Agency, Board & Commission Governance & Relationship Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering formal registration of individuals and businesses who may lobby the municipality to offer their services, or advocate a particular direction.
Name: Lobbyist Registration

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering oversight and management of transformation initiatives.
Name: Change Initiative Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering alignment of programs and services offered by the municipality with the strategic directions of the corporation.
Name: Program and Service Planning and Monitoring

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering alignment of programs offered by the municipality with the strategic directions of the corporation.
Name: Program Planning

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering alignment of services offered by the municipality with the strategic directions of the corporation.
Name: Service Planning

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering measurement and monitoring of program and service performance.
Name: Program & Service Performance Measurement & Monitoring

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering monitoring of financial processes and systems in the corporation, the compliance of the corporation with its policies, procedures and standards, and the value for money in delivery of services to the public and internally.
Name: Internal Auditing

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering monitoring of risks associated with the delivery of services to the public and internally.
Name: Risk Assessment

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering monitoring of  the value for money in delivery of services to the public and internally.
Name: Value for Money Auditing

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering monitoring of financial processes and systems in the corporation in delivery of services to the public and internally.
Name: Financial Auditing

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering monitoring of the manner in which the municipality delivers its services to the public and internally.
Name: Operational Auditing

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering monitoring of the compliance of the corporation with its policies, procedures and standards in delivery of services to the public and internally.
Name: Compliance Auditing

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering monitoring of peculiar circumstances that may violate the ethics of the corporation in delivery of services to the public and internally.
Name: Forensic Investigation

Requirement text: An internal service provided to public service providers offering integration of public facing processes in support of improved service delivery.
Name: Integrated Delivery

Requirement text: An internal service provided to emergency service providers offering integrated call taking in support of emergency service providers / first responder agencies.
An internal service provided to community service providers offering call taking and referral of inquiries about available community services.

An internal service provided to public service providers offering a single point of contact by the public in accessing a service, in supporting public facing processes, and in fulfilling a service request.
An internal service provided to the corporation offering interpretation and translation of program and service information.
Name: Interpretation and Translation

Requirement text: An internal service that mitigates the risk to the Corporation posed by the delivery of services.
Name: Risk Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the Corporation providing secretarial / clerical support to the administration of departments, agencies, boards and commissions, and to Council.
Name: Council and Administrative Support

Requirement text: An internal service that provides support to the Corporation through the exercise of skills by or under the supervision of legally trained and qualified staff.
Name: Legal Support
Council and Committees of Council Advisory

Requirement text: An internal service that drafts and enacts policies governing the services delivered by “My Municipality” (public policy) and how “My Municipality” operates in the delivery of its services (corporate policy).
Name: Policy Development

Requirement text: An internal service that prepares and legally binds parties to an agreement to govern the purchase of products and/or services.
Name: Contract / Agreement Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the Corporation offering communication to the public and all parties that work for or with “My Municipality”.
Name: Corporate Communications

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering emergency and/or disaster recovery planning, coordination, temporary shelter, and monitoring.
Name: Emergency / Disaster Recovery

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering budget preparation and monitoring, accounting, investment / debt management, and grant / subsidy management.
Name: Financial Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering prioritization and allocation of resources in support of programs and services to be delivered in a given fiscal period.
Name: Financial Planning and Budgeting

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering investments opportunities which may include: money market funds, bond funds, sinking funds, pension funds, trust funds, city owned subsidiaries, debt.
Name: Investment / Debt Management

Requirement text: An internal service that accounts for revenues and expenditures by an approved budget account.
Name: Accounting

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the Corporation offering support, accounting and reporting of grants / subsidies offered by “My Municipality” to external service providers, and grants and subsidies received from other governments and organizations.
Name: Grants / Subsidies Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to property owners offering fair, equitable valuation of property for taxation purposes.
Name: Property Valuation

Requirement text: A public service provided to property owners offering property tax collection for municipal services without fees.
Name: Property Tax Billing and Collection
Property Tax Account Creation and Maintenance

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering support in the hiring of employees and growth in their development.
Name: Human Resource Management

Requirement text: An internal service providing support to the corporation in the qualification and selection of human resources.
Name: Human Resource Recruitment Support

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the Corporation offering employees training and development in support of increased productivity and career and personal development of employees...
Name: Employee Learning and Development

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation and employees offering support in maintaining employee-employer relationships to resolve problems which arise out of the workplace or that affect it, and working with employees to resolve any professional and/or personal issues that may be implicating their productivity.
Name: Employee and Labour Relations

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering compensation packages comprised of position wage rates and benefits, and paying the employee in accordance with the compensation package.
Name: Compensation and Benefits Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation and employees offering a healthy, well and a safe environment.
Name: Workplace Health, Wellness and Safety

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering purchasing and control of acquired goods and services.
Name: Materiel Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering assistance in the preparation of requests for proposal, request for tender, and requests for quotation, management of vendor contracts and the issuance of purchase orders.
Name: Purchasing

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering management of fuel for consumption by fleet and equipment.
Name: Fuel Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering engineering expertise to design and construction new infrastructure and/or facility projects.
Name: Engineering Design and Construction

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering expertise in conducting an environmental assessment of a prospective site to be used for program and service delivery.
Name: Environmental Assessment Analysis

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering expertise in surveying prospective sites for survey boundaries, soil conditions, etc.
Name: Land & Site Surveying

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering expertise in the preliminary and schematic design of prospective infrastructure and/or facilities.
Name: Preliminary / Schematic Design

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering expertise in the detailed design of prospective infrastructure and/or facilities.
Name: Detailed Design

Requirement text: An internal service provide to the corporation offering oversight of construction contracts to ensure compliance with the terms and conditions of the agreement.
Name: Construction Contract Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering expertise in monitoring construction projects including the use / disposition of materials required to support the construction effort.
Name: Construction Site Inspection & Progress Payment Approval

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering sign off on a proposed construction project for infrastructure and / or facilities prior to turning the asset over for program / service delivery.
Name: Asset Commissioning

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering monitoring of terms and conditions associated with the warranty of a product or constructed asset.
Name: Asset Warranty Monitoring

Requirement text: An internal service that determines the acquisition needs for vehicles and equipment, maintains the vehicles and equipment and disposes of vehicles and equipment.
Name: Fleet Management

Requirement text: An internal service that supports the Corporation by providing a well maintained building to deliver programs and services.
Name: Facility Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering support in the management of the real estate portfolio by acquiring land, and managing property rights owned properties, disposing of lands deemed surplus to the needs of “My Municipality”.
Name: Real Property Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering access to property owned by other title holders for municipal use, or provision of municipally owned property for third party / public use.
Name: Real Property Lease Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering management of information, records, and information technology solutions.
Name: Information and Information Technology Management

Requirement text: A public service provided to information requesters offering access to public information under the Municipal Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act, and Personal Health Information Protection Act, and the Municipal Act.
Name: Information Access

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering the modeling, integration, and stewardship of corporate information, designing forms, managing the lifecycle management of records, managing documents, and providing print, courier and mail distribution services.
Name: Records and Information Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation to ensure that business processes and overall needs are supported with the right Information Technology solutions. Involves researching, evaluating, recommending, implementing and supporting technology applications.
Name: Business Solutions Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation for the hosting of applications and technology services (e.g. e-mail, voice mail, telephone, data network, etc.), ensuring availability, capacity, performance, continuity, recovery, security and asset management.
Name: Information Technology Infrastructure Management

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering analysis (requirements definition) and development of business solutions.
Name: Business Solution Analysis and Development

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering maintenance of operational application systems.
Name: Application Maintenance

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering training to intended business users in the use of business solutions.
Name: Business Solution User Training

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation offering functional support of business solutions.
Name: Business Solution Functional Support

Requirement text: An internal service provided to the corporation for the hosting of applications and technology services (e.g. e-mail, voice mail, telephone, data network, etc.), ensuring availability, capacity, performance, continuity, recovery, security and asset management.
Name: Information Technology Infrastructure Management
